content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 36, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 22, "index": 23}, {"type": "pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 31, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 50, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 37}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a wooden_hoe, I need to first craft dark_oak_planks from dark_oak_log. Therefore, I will move the dark_oak_log from slot 15 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_fence", "quantity": 36, "index": 13}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 16}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 22, "index": 23}, {"type": "pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 31, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 50, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 37}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the dark_oak_planks have been crafted, I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft the wooden_hoe.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a wooden_hoe, I need to place 2 sticks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stick from slot 39 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
